body:
Sink: Do you want to wash your face?

[1]: Wash face
[2]: Leave
title: Sink

body:

[1]: Dry face
[2]: Walk away
title: WashFace

body:
Mirror: You look into the mirror and see a familiar stranger.

[1]: Look closer
[2]: Walk away
title: Mirror

body:
Mirror: You see a reflection of what seems to be yourself.

[1]: Walk away
title: LookCloser
